name: Ballou PR
overview:
Ballou PR is different. We’re a PR agency, but we’re also part of something bigger – your world.

Our unwavering focus on technology, bio-technology and related industries (including VC and business services) is such that we are embedded in those industries, with strong ties and an extensive network.

Our ecosystem includes technology players, influential journalists and industry analysts, investors, advisors and commentators.

Ballou PR provides strategic B-to-B and B-to-C public relations services that enable clients to establish a leading presence in domestic or foreign markets.

We use innovative methods to raise our clients’ profiles in key industries and amongst target audiences, and build the close relationships necessary to create opportunities and secure deals. We move beyond media relations - using analyst relations, social media, business networking, awards and conferences to make a difference.
